name: Jorge Ramirez
description: Top-rated real estate agent serving 103 communities across Union, Essex, Morris, Middlesex, and Hudson County in Northern New Jersey. Specializing in luxury homes, NYC commuter properties, and first-time home buyers since 2017.

itemOffered.name: Home Buying Services
itemOffered.description: Exclusive access to off-market listings, targeted property search, and expert negotiation for home buyers across Northern NJ

itemOffered.name: Home Selling Services
itemOffered.description: Data-driven pricing, professional marketing, AI-powered buyer targeting, and intelligent lead generation for home sellers

itemOffered.name: NYC Commuter Property Specialist
itemOffered.description: Expert guidance on homes near Midtown Direct train lines and top commuter towns in NJ

itemOffered.name: First-Time Home Buyer Services
itemOffered.description: Complete guidance through the home buying process for first-time buyers in New Jersey
